## In this file I examine the analysis of Oeppen and Vaupel (2002)

# What else can I analyze

# saving new file    
```{r}


gapminder_unfiltered%>%
  group_by(year)%>%
  filter(lifeExp==max(lifeExp))%>%
  ungroup()%>%
  select(year, country, lifeExp)%>%
  arrange(year)->
  sumdat




view(sumdat)
```
